title: So You Want to Be a Wizard
description: Something stopped Nita's hand as it ran along the bookshelf. She looked and found that one of the books had a loose thread at the top of its spine. It was one of those So You Want to Be a . . . books, a series on careers. So You Want to Be a Pilot, and a Scientist . . . a Writer. But this one said, So You Want to Be a Wizard.I don't believe this, Nita thought. She shut the book and stood there holding it in her hand, confused, amazed, suspicious - and delighted. If it was a joke, it was a great one. If it wasn't . . . ?
author: Diane Duane
